alert-text-1: The My Studyinfo â€“service provides extra services for registered users. You can register by using Finnish internet banking codes, Finnish electronic ID-card or mobile certificate. Applicants who have none of these cannot access this service. As an identified user you can edit your application form during the application period: change the order of preference of study programme choices, add and remove study programme choices. Later in autumn 2014 My Studyinfo will also include information about results of the selection process and the possibility to accept a study place electronically.
